testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should be redirected to the home page................................passed And I should see the products inventory.....................................passed And the page title should contain "Products"................................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid username
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "invalid_user"........................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed And I should remain on the login page.......................................passed And the error message should contain "Username and password do not match"...passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "invalid_password".....................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed And I should remain on the login page.......................................passed And the error message should contain "Username and password do not match"...passed

testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username ""....................................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed And I should remain on the login page.......................................passed And the error message should contain "Username is required".................passed

testcase.name: Login with empty password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "".....................................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed And I should remain on the login page.......................................passed And the error message should contain "Password is required".................passed

testcase.name: Login with both fields empty
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username ""....................................................passed And I enter password "".....................................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed And I should remain on the login page.......................................passed And the error message should contain "Username is required".................passed

testcase.name: Login with extremely long password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "this_is_a_very_long_password_that_exceeds_normal_limits_and_should_be_tested_for_boundary_conditions_in_our_application_testing_framework_for_security_purposes".passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed And I should remain on the login page.......................................passed

testcase.name: Verify home page elements after successful login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the SauceDemo login page......................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should be redirected to the home page................................passed And I should see the app logo...............................................passed And I should see the shopping cart icon.....................................passed And I should see at least 6 products........................................passed And I should see product names and prices...................................passed
